search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Moosend (moosend.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Moosend is: [https://moosend.com/pricing/](https://moosend.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

![Image 72](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)![Image 74](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)![Image 76](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

*   ### Choose your addons
    
    \*You can select more than one addons
    
      Dedicated IPs _i_
    
    Dedicated IPs provide a unique IP address for sending your emails, enhancing url deliverability.
    
     Transactional Emails _i_
    
    Enable high-priority, event-driven emails such as order confirmations and [password resets](https://moosend.com/pricing/#). Audience Discovery _i_
    
    Leverage advanced data insights to better understand and target your audience. Custom Dashboards _i_
    
    Create tailored dashboards for tracking key performance indicators. Hosted Files _i_
    
    Securely host files for easy access and sharing within your campaigns. More Team Members _i_
    
    Add more team members with controlled access to your account. SSO & SAML _i_
    
    Add an extra level of security to your account. With Single-Sign-On and SAML authentication, validate users and make sure they have an uninterrupted experience with Moosend.
